items.title: Atlas Air, DHL terminate Polar Air Cargo joint venture
items.description: Polar Air Cargo has ceased operating after Atlas Air and DHL Express determined the joint venture was no longer useful. The post Atlas Air, DHL terminate Polar Air Cargo joint venture appeared first on FreightWaves.

items.description: The Trump administration is planning to lay off at least 40% of the Federal Housing Administrationâ€™s (FHA) workers, according to a Bloomberg report.

items.title: Blue Origin Prepares for Layoffs. Here's What Space Stock Investors Need to Know
items.description: When it comes to space companies, layoffs aren't always bad news.

items.title: Boeing's chief aerospace safety officer set to retire, memo shows
items.description: The aerospace company in the next few weeks will appoint a successor to Delaney who has been working with Boeing for nearly four decades, company chief Kelly Ortberg told employees in an internal message.  Delaney, appointed in 2021, bolstered Boeing's safety practices, the message said.
